name: Process Job Queue
description: Process pending jobs from job_executions table. Finds all jobs with status='pending', executes them (workflows, tasks, etc.), and updates their status. This is the worker that makes autonomous loops actually run by processing scheduled jobs and event-triggered workflows.

space_id.description: Optional space ID to process jobs from (defaults to current space)

limit.description: Optional limit on number of jobs to process in this run (default: 10)

job_type.description: Optional filter to only process specific job types (e.g., 'workflow', 'task')
